title: Looking for duo partner
body:
Hey guys, Uh just looking for someone to queue up with, I'm currently g5 and play a lot of vayne, corki and graves.
Rank must be around mine, otherwise it will affect mmr
Would be much better if you had access to something like teamspeak (preferably), I have skype as well.
If anyone would be interested then feel free to add me in game "Lycal" 
Looking foward to playing with the person that is currently reading this post and decides to add me haha.

replies.body:
Ha, the end of this post was like... 


"A GUY LIKE ME? I'M A GUY LIKE ME!"

I was G5 last season, had a shocker of AFK'ers episode in all 10 of my placements.
Even if you don't wanna duo, I'm sure we could learn a thing or two from each other. 

Add me if you like mate.

See you soon...
Uhh yes, bad players seek bad players, as expected!

Hello friends, I too am an ADC main, but unlike this player I am not terrible at the game.
Feel friend to compare my ADC to his, then add me because you come to the realisation that I am significantly better!
Best of luck, bye!

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/champions/userName=Justify
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/champions/userName=lycal

As you can see my stats are significantly better, not only that but I am an experienced Jungler, and bot lane being the type to be camped by a mid/jungle I am well aware of the dangers these roles pose to the well being of the teams ADC/Jg/Supp
